description: Communication and Analytics refers to the way an organization conveys messages, policies, and initiatives aimed at promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) among its employees. Effective communication is crucial for ensuring that these initiatives are understood, valued, and embraced by the workforce. Analytics, on the other hand, involves using tools and data analysis techniques to measure and understand the impact of DEI initiatives. This can include tracking participation rates, feedback, and outcomes related to these programs to assess their effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.
